name: The Escape (itch) (Lucas Stark)
description:
You've managed to escape your cell, but can you escape from the prison?

Complete each level by reaching the exit with both boxes.

Both boxes are connected with an elastic rope. It might make traversing some platforms difficult, but you can use it to your advantage and swing boxes to places hard to reach.

You can brace each box to the floor / platform they're standing on to make them resistant to the force of the rope, making it easier to swing the other box. Be careful not to hit a braced box with the other one, as it still can be moved by collisions!

Controls:

Small Box:
A/D - move left/right
W - jump (hold to jump higher)
S - jump down off a platform
1 - brace/unbrace (when on a platform/floor)

Large Box:
Left/Right - move left/right
Up - jump (hold to jump higher)
Down - jump down off a platform
2 - brace/unbrace (when on a platform/floor)

Rope:
Left Ctrl - shorten the rope
Space - lengthen the rope
